name: Sword Slingers!
description:
Welcome to Sword Slingers!

The rules are simple: move your mouse around to rotate your sword.

When your sword contacts an enemy, it will be destroyed!

Protect your Core for as long as you can!

10 different swords, 10 different abilities!

8 waves for you to slice your way through!

Frequent updates!

KEY COMMANDS:

  • P - Pause Game
